response.original_title: Happy Tweet: The Journey of K.M. Nahidul Islam
response.overview: “Happy Tweet: The Journey of K.M.” is a short documentary that follows the inspiring story of K.M. Nahidul Islam, a young web developer from Bangladesh. From humble beginnings to founding the social platform Happy Tweet, the film captures his passion, challenges, and growth in the digital world.
response.tagline: From a simple idea to a digital voice — the journey of a Bangladeshi dreamer.
response.title: Happy Tweet: The Journey of K.M. Nahidul Islam
